start.speaker: Rusk
start.text:
Now swear it—not to me. To the craft.

Name one thing you will never forge, no matter the reward.

choices.text: I won’t forge tools for slaughter.
I won’t forge chains for the innocent.

end.speaker: Narrator
end.text: Rusk nods. The oath doesn’t make you good—but it gives you a line you can measure yourself against.
